author: Special Correspondent
text:
Lakshmi Machine Works (LMW) will contribute for the Swachh Bharat Mission under its Corporate Social Responsibility.

According to its director (finance), R. Rajendran, the company will sponsor construction of 200 household toilets here. The fund requirement for each toilet is Rs. 12,000 and Rs. 24 lakh will be paid by LMW for the construction. Mr. Rajendran also appealed to the Corporation Commissioner to provide the list of beneficiaries with their address and details of the project schedule (when the works would be completed).
title: LMW contribution to Swachh Bharat
